ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 154
ygData.msgSnippet: Heheh that s funny to see that  3 days after i post the same message on some forums, a big petition for wizzard is up :) And heu by the way, where is everyone
ygData.messageBody:
Heheh that s funny to see that 3 days after i post the same message on some
forums, a big petition for wizzard is up :)
And heu by the way, where is everyone ? :)

nobody is reading that post again? :)

I have found one of the best place to solo from 24 -> 29. I will post it as
soon as i am level 27 or so to be sure it will not be heavily camped :)


see you all !

Yakos
level 25 wizzard on karana
